channel.title: Protecting Project Pulp
channel.description: Protecting Project Pulp was an "Audio Pulp Fiction Magazine" hosted by Dave Robison and Simon Hildebrandt, and produced by Fred Himebaugh. PPP was originally serialised between 2012 and 2014.
channel.itunes:author: Simon Hildebrandt
channel.itunes:summary: Protecting Project Pulp was an "Audio Pulp Fiction Magazine" hosted by Dave Robison and Simon Hildebrandt, and produced by Fred Himebaugh. PPP was originally serialised between 2012 and 2014.
